dcterms:description: The FV3GFS dataset consists of simulations from the Finite-Volume on a Cubed-Sphere Global Forecasting System, which is used for climate modeling and weather forecasting. It provides data saved every 6 hours over a 10-year period, allowing for the evaluation of climate models.
dcterms:title: FV3GFS

dcterms:creator: Oliver Watt-Meyer

Mike Pritchard
Boris Bonev
Christopher Bretherton
dcterms:description: ACE (AI2 Climate Emulator) is a fast, skillful learned global atmospheric model for climate prediction. It is designed to emulate the FV3GFS model and is capable of producing stable and physically consistent climate simulations over long time periods.
dcterms:title: ACE (AI2 Climate Emulator)

dcterms:creator: Salva RÃ¼hling Cachay
Venkatesh Ramesh
Jason N. S. Cole
Howard Barker
David Rolnick
dcterms:description: ClimART is a benchmark dataset for emulating atmospheric radiative transfer in weather and climate models. It provides a standardized set of data for evaluating the performance of models in simulating radiative processes.
dcterms:title: ClimART
